customCommand.description: Implements a very basic command system using the experiment chatbefore event. See https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/scriptapi/minecraft/server/chatsendbeforeeventsignal
body: // Cancel event if the message contains 'cancel'
// Send a modified version of chat message

minibiomes.description: Tests a roller coaster obstacle course. See https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/scriptapi/minecraft/server/entityrideablecomponent
body: const minecart = test.spawn(MinecraftEntityTypes.Minecart, { x: 9, y: 7, z: 7 });
const pig = test.spawn(MinecraftEntityTypes.Pig, { x: 9, y: 7, z: 7 });
